entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 06:48 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 06:48 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
